entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Performance of `GetMigrations()` extension method over `DatabaseFacade` #30192
  • IEnumerable Contains(...) generates non parameterized sql #30201
  • EFCore 7 - Aggregate types - Update JSON column without using any JSON function #30283
  • EFCore 7 - Aggregate types- Inserting custom value for boolean key in JSON column #30276
  • ExecuteUpdateAsync don't work when using "modelBuilder.Entity<Country>().Navigation(e => e.MyFile).AutoInclude();" in Context #30250
  • EnitytFrameworkCore.InMemory v6.0.13: FromSqlRaw throws InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'System.Linq.Expressions.ConstantExpression' to type 'Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Query.QueryRootExpression. #30267
  • Apply Migrations Bundles:error #30259
  • Missing word in sentence #30260
  • Prevent changing value of columns by attribute #30238
  • Auto insert for a related entity may insert duplicated rows with a `one-to-one` relationship #30236
  • Translate TimeOnly.AddHours, AddMinutes on SQLite #30223
  • Wrong EF migration script generated from same entity #30209
  • SqlException: "No column name was specified for column 1 of 't'" on IQueryable.Count() with Skip and Take #30239
  • MySQL EnityFramework Errors in MAUI #30189
  • Problem with optional foreign keys #30184
  • EFCore migration for encrypted sqlite throws exception #30179
  • asp.net core entity framework core issues #30292

Updated

  • JOIN instead of CROSS APPLY in generated query in SQL Server #17936
    Backlog
  • Query: missing parens for complex query with Not and Negate #30277
    8.0.0
  • Query/NullSemantics: full expansion not necessary for bool results in projection on sql server because we convert to CASE block anyway (search condition) #30264
    Backlog
  • Query: convert `NOT(match LIKE pattern)` to `match NOT LIKE pattern` #30263
    Backlog
  • Query: potential bug in null semantics VisitSqlBinary #30247
    Backlog
  • Sum throwing exception when property has a ValueConverter with ConvertsNulls set to true #30233
    Backlog
  • Consider cancelling the command in SaveChanges when an error occurs #30182
    Backlog
  • Support of unnamed parameters in Microsoft.Data.Sqlite #24480
    Backlog
  • Tools: Honor launchSettings.json #8695
    Backlog
  • Scaffold-DbContext generates DateTime instead of DateTimeOffset for PostgreSQL database #30274
  • Issues with get only collections in EF7 #30286
  • "You need to call SQLitePCL.raw.SetProvider()" error when using Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite 5.0.4 via C++\CLI wrapper #24493
    Backlog
  • Generate the compiled model during build #24894
    Backlog
  • Migrations script not using IDesignTimeDbContextFactory #25053
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #30289
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #30288
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.4

Updated

  • SqlServer: Support hierarchyid #30291
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.31.2 to 3.32.0 #30272
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
